content:
I apologize for any confusion earlier! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences or experiment with techniques like layering and blending. I exist solely to provide information and assist with questions to the best of my abilities.

However, I can share general information and tips on layering and blending techniques, as well as provide guidance on how to overcome common challenges that artists may face when using these techniques.

If you'd like, I can offer more suggestions and ideas on how to experiment with layering and blending in your abstract expressionist piece. We can also discuss specific challenges you're facing or questions you have about these techniques, and I'll do my best to help you troubleshoot or find a solution.

Let me know how I can assist you further!
